places.name: Jayme Ferragut Municipal Park
places.address: Estrada da Boiada, s/n - Portal, Vinhedo - SP
places.description: Green area with a lake, event stage, playground, and craft fair on weekends.

places.name: Monastery of São Bento
places.address: Rua Benedito Storani, 1115 - Caixa D’água, Vinhedo - SP
places.description: Monastery with a shop selling handmade products by the monks and a peaceful meditation area.

places.name: João Gasparini Reservoir
places.address: Av. Aparecida Tellau Seraphim, Vinhedo - SP
places.description: Reservoir with a walking track, gym equipment, and a panoramic viewpoint.

places.name: Sant’Ana Parish Church
places.description: Historic 19th-century church with beautiful stained glass and colonial architecture.

places.name: Vinhedo Portal
places.address: Estrada da Boiada, s/n - Portal, Vinhedo - SP
places.description: Symbolic entrance to the city with typical Italian architecture and a photo spot.

places.name: Immigrant Memorial
places.address: Rua Humberto Pescarini, 330 - Centro, Vinhedo - SP
places.description: Space dedicated to the history of Italian immigrants with exhibitions and historical artifacts.

places.name: Wine Festival
places.address: Jayme Ferragut Municipal Park, Vinhedo - SP
places.description: Traditional cultural event featuring artisanal wine, typical foods, and artistic performances.

places.name: Vinhedo Railway Station
places.address: Av. Independência, 2000 - Vila Planalto, Vinhedo - SP
places.description: Old railway station preserved as a cultural and tourist spot, with exhibitions and railway history.
